name: py-jupyter-lsp

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Multi-Language Server WebSocket proxy for Jupyter Notebook/Lab server.

dependencies.name: py-jupyter-server
dependencies.description:
The Jupyter Server provides the backend (i.e. the core services, APIs,
and REST endpoints) for Jupyter web applications like Jupyter notebook,
JupyterLab, and Voila.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab
dependent_to.description:
JupyterLab is the next-generation web-based user interface for Project
Jupyter.
